roleset.name: to bring peace, quiet, or relieve
roleset.note: APPEASE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'appease' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. (from appease.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: transitive
example.text: After Mr. Sullivan waffled on abortion last year , the White House appeased right-to-lifers by [*-1] surrounding him with pro-life deputies .
example.arg: After Mr. Sullivan waffled on abortion last year
by [*-1] surrounding him with pro-life deputies
